definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The formation of scheelite deposit has an intimate relationship with amphibole-schist.
sentences.chinese: 白鎢礦礦牀的形成與角閃片岩關係密切。

sentences.english: The Yangjin'gou scheelite deposit occurs in Wudaogou group of lower palaeozoic Erathem.
sentences.chinese: 楊金溝白鎢礦牀產於下古生界五道溝羣中。

sentences.english: The Yangjingou scheelite occurs in Wudaogou Group.
sentences.chinese: 楊金溝白鎢礦牀產於五道溝羣中。

sentences.english: The melting and reduction of scheelite acted by high temperature electric arc are very fast.
sentences.chinese: 在高溫電弧作用下，白鎢礦粉的熔化還原速率很快。

sentences.english: However, the Xintianling granite contains magmatic scheelite and wolframite.
sentences.chinese: 後者則以出現岩漿白鎢礦和黑鎢礦爲特徵。

sentences.english: Determination of micro beryllium in scheelite by polarography was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對白鎢礦中微量鈹的極譜測定進行了探討。
